entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:56 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 43 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -24.5°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
